title: [Large-Scale] Hypermedia Learning Design for Understanding ATP Synthase Structure and Function

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of cellular respiration and basic enzyme concepts, familiarity with foundational biology terminology
context.additional_context: Requirement for mobile-optimized content delivery in limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately describe the three-dimensional structure of ATP synthase through 2D/3D animations.
Learners can systematically explain the ATP generation mechanism from the perspective of chemiosmosis.
Learners can reproduce the rotational motion principles of enzymes using visual cues.

resources: Step-by-Step Visual Cue Learning Guide PDF
ATP Synthase Structural Model Image Set
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
